title: Kismet108
author: Kismet108
content: Have an ebang ebit 10.1 but can’t access it .  Trying to download the ebit miner mini management tool but eBangs site is no longer working for anything miner related.  Hoping someone on the forum may have a download of the file : ebitminerminiv1.0.3.5en.zip Cheers

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: It seems that ebang website is currently under attack or might have hosting issue because I can't able to go through with their website I used archive.org to check only the download URL of that software which is this.Code:https://ebang.oss-cn-hongkong.aliyuncs.com/EbitMinerMiniV1.0.3.5EN.zipThe problem is that the link is also dead or it seems they remove it. Why not try to use other managing tools like Minerstat, Awesomeminer and hiveOS. They do support ebang units and support almost all ASIC models.

comments.author: NGrainy
comments.body: I found "Ebang Miner Management Method" on the "ASIC Miner Troubleshoot" page of zeusbtc.com, and then I checked Ebang's official website according to the introduction, but it seems that the website has changed, and I can't find the download link of the management tool . I think you could try contacting their staff, and ask if there is an other download method or if they have a file for the tool.

comments.author: Serjone
comments.body: here link to  EMM:Code:farstyle.net/soft/EbitMinerMiniV1.0.3.5EN.zipAlso you can use MyFarm x100, it can be downloaded in telegram chanel:Code:https://t.me/myfarm_updates

comments.author: paramind22
comments.body: Quote from: Serjone on July 22, 2022, 02:32:09 PMhere link to  EMM:Code:farstyle.net/soft/EbitMinerMiniV1.0.3.5EN.zipAlso you can use MyFarm x100, it can be downloaded in telegram chanel:Code:https://t.me/myfarm_updatesThis EMM tool is in Chinese.   That telegram is in Russian.  Anyone know a modern solution to controlling this Ebang miner?
